markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Starshot Arrow](/Equipment.aspx?ID=772)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 48</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** arrow

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The metal of these arrows is said to have come from a star that ventured too close to Golarion and was shot down by a moonlit archer. When you activate and shoot a _starshot arrow_, you take no range penalties against any target that you can personally detect. There must be a line of effect between you and the target.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 7"
pfs="Standard"
>
Starshot Arrow (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 48</row>

**Price** 55 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The target must be within the maximum range of your weapon.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 14"
pfs="Standard"
>
Starshot Arrow (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 48</row>

**Price** 800 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You can fire at any creature you can detect, regardless of range. The arrow travels instantly, hitting your target as soon as you fire the arrow. This is a [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156) effect.
name: Starshot Arrow (Greater)
